fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.synopsis: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.
fields.excerpt: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
fields.excerpt: When Earth becomes uninhabitable, an ex-NASA pilot and a team of researchers mission is to find a new planet for humans.
